transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Sanjeev ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji bol raha hun.
Executive: Aur sir Shahnawaz Talwar baat kar raha hun senior manager IndiaMART ke office se.
Customer: Haan ji ji boliye.
Executive: Aur sir aapki ek query aayi thi hamare paas Sarshi Verma hai na aapke account manager wo mere paas aayi thi kuch complaint leke aapki.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Bulk ki buylead nahi aa rahi hai aapko right?
Customer: Hmm nahi sir humko IndiaMART se bahar nikalna hai.
Executive: Nahi matlab services aapko band karani hai right?
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Hame paisa wapas chahiye sir.
Executive: But sir aapne services to abhi tak use hi nahi kari hai.
Customer: Sir aisa koi banda nahi mila ki humko use kara sake.
Customer: Keval keval khana purti ho rahi hai ki aap lead le lijiye ye kar lijiye ye bhej dijiye 50 kilo ka 75 kilo ka is tarah ka hum log kam nahi karte na sir.
Executive: Haan mujhe pata hai sir aap bulk mein hi business karenge aur IndiaMART bulk ka hi platform hai B to B industry hai sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Customer aapko Prayagraj ke aas pass ka hi chahiye?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ya pure pan India chalega to koi dikkat nahi hai. Nahi nahi nahi only UP.
Executive: UP keval chalega right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Jo aapki categories hai gram floor hai rock salt hai singara aata hai hybrid maize seed hai basmati seed hai iske alawa koi aur category hai aap jisme aap deal karte hain?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi.
Executive: Yahi bas categories hai aapki?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Just a second. Main check kar leta hun.

Executive: To aapka wholesale ka kam hai sir ya manufacturing unit bhi laga rakhi hai aapne?
Customer: Sir wholesale ka hai. Unit to manufacturing hai manufacturing hai mera ji.
Executive: Achcha kalash ke naam se aapka hi brand hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Minimum order quantity aapko kitni chahiye?
Customer: Minimum sir 5 quintal 10 quintal 20 quintal minimum 10 quintal to chahiye 5 quintal iske niche to chahiye nahi.
Executive: 100 kilo 500 kilo se upar?
Customer: 500 kilo ke upar.
Executive: 500 kilo se upar chahiye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir dekh lijiye refundable ho jaye to bahut achcha rahega sir.
Executive: Sir problem ye hai na hamare paas aapke product line ka customer achcha khasa hai to company approve nahi karegi aapka refund jo hai na wo policy mein likha hota hai sir to main ek kam kar deta hun aapke liye aapko kuch nahi karna simple ek kam kar deta hun aapke liye special jo hamare prime client hote hain badi services mein unko hum whatsapp assistance dete hain matlab ye hai ki jo customer hamare paas aate hain bulk ki hum unko whatsapp pe share karwa dete hain to main aap main Sarshi se bol ke aapka ek personal whatsapp group banwa deta hun IndiaMART ka aapko IndiaMART application open karne ki jarurat nahi padegi customer ki direct detail aapke whatsapp pe share karenge daily basis pe hum aapko simple bas itna kam karna hai aapko samne dikhega usme ki customer kahan ka hai aur kitni requirement usko chahiye wo call karke hi aapko confirm karna hai bas to baat kariye customer se aur apni deal final kariye aap unse aur ye aise karke agar mahine mein hum aapko 15 customer bhi genuine de payenge to waha se aapka kuch na kuch business jarur nikalega sir.
Customer: Sir abhi ek do mahine mein to koi ek customer to mila nahi mujhe. Nahi isiliye nahi mila na sir kyunki aapki jo aapka jo pattern hai wahi nahi ban paya IndiaMART pe hamare system ko pata hi nahi chal paya ki aap kis product line mein deal matlab kitne order quantity mein aap deal karte hain aapka catalog to humne bana diya lekin jaise aap artificial intelligence ko jante hain aap jaise youtube use karte honge waha agar man lijiye cricket ki videos aap dekh rahe hain news channel dekh rahe hain to youtube na aapke pattern ko capture kar leta hai fir agli time jab aap kabhi do teen char din baad youtube open karenge to wahi videos aapko suggestion mein dikhegi to isi tarike se hamara IndiaMART ki service bhi wo AI based hoti hai agar man lijiye aapne aaj 500 kilo ki requirement Prayagraj ke aas pass Vaishali se ya Koshambi se aapne jo hai consume kari to hamare system mein wo pattern record ho jayega agli bar jab aap IndiaMART app open karenge to aapko waha near by location ki bhi buylead aapko aur high quantity mein dikhegi to us pattern ko generate karne ke liye main customer aapko directly whatsapp pe share karwa deta hun us din ke liye jab aapka yaha se business nikal jaye thoda ROI justify ho jaye uske baad hum video meeting se aapko sari cheeze samjha denge pehle main aapko business dila dun uske baad hum aage ki baat karenge.
Customer: Chaliye theek hai ye bhi kar lete hain. Itna to karna itna to kar lenge na sir ki agar main customer aapko directly whatsapp pe share karun to aap unse baat kar le. Bilkul bilkul kar lunga.
Executive: Theek hai sir to whatsapp pe aapko ek photo milega niche link hoga us pe click karenge directly customer ki detail aapke samne open ho jayegi sir. Theek hai theek hai wo bhi karke dekh lete hain. Aapka aapka koi staff hai ya aap khud hi use karenge sir? Main hum khud hi use karte hain.
Executive: Achcha aapke yaha pe do number hai sir ek to 82 se start hai sorry sorry ek second. Hmm. Do number hai aapke hamare paas mein ek to 98 se start hai last mein 188 hai aur dusra bhi 98 se start hai 188 hai dono number add karne whatsapp group mein? Haan haan dono number add kar dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai sir abhi ke abhi hum aapka group generate karwate hain waha pe aapko buylead share karwate hain aaj ke aaj hi aap kuch customer se baat kariye aur dheere dheere improve customer aayenge sir aapke paas jaise jaise aapka pattern banega waise waise bas aapka kam itna hai hum aapko waha se filter out karke bhejenge to din ki ek ya do requirement aapko waha pe milegi to unko aap consume karke baat kariye sir. Chaliye theek hai.
Executive: Jo paisa aapne lagaya hai pehla pehle wo nikalwane ki koshish karte hain uske baad hum aapke profit ki baat karenge. Ji theek hai sir. Aapke paas abhi feedback aa jayega sir mere liye theek hai? Theek theek.
Executive: Thank you. Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to exit IndiaMART.

- Wants refund for unused services.

- Not getting relevant buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive offered WhatsApp assistance with direct leads.

- Will create a personal WhatsApp group for customer.

- Will share customer details directly on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will create WhatsApp group.

- Customer will receive buyleads on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, whatsapp, subscription
